stark_settings.description: Input parameters for filtering the STARK spectra

filterfile.description: Name of the file that contains the (measured) filter functions. If set to 'none', then the input parameters 'filtershape' and 'filterwidth' are used.

mappingfile.description: Name of the file that contains the info mapping each fibre bundle to the correct filter in the 'filterfile'.

filtershape.description: The band shape of the filter (gauss or lorentz)

filterwidth.description: The band width (FWHM) of the filter.

angle.description: Half opening angle of the finite spread of incident angles on the filter.

neff.description: Effective refractive index of the filter.
